Question: Daqin New Energy Tech (Taizhou) Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Daqin New Energy Tech (Taizhou) Co., Ltd

CES 2024 Product Highlight and Specification

- New industrial and commercial all-in-one DH200F with All-in-one design
- Single cabinet integrated PCS PACK EMS and other modules
- Support outdoor installation and multi-cabinet integrated delivery
- Low Voltage and High Voltage Home Energy and Commercial Energy products
- Focus on lithium-ion energy storage track with rapid growth and overseas market expansion
- Signed a 2023 Purchase and Sales Framework Contract with Highstar for lithium-ion battery modules and batteries worth over 600 million yuan
Summary_cn:
大秦新能源科技（泰州）有限公司

2024国际消费电子展产品亮点与规格

- 全新的工业与商用一体化DH200F，采用全一体设计
- 单机柜集成PCS PACK EMS和其他模块
- 支持室外安装和多机柜一体化交付
- 低压和高压家庭能源和商业能源产品
- 专注于锂离子储能领域，实现快速增长和海外市场扩张
- 与Highstar签署了2023年购销框架合同，价值超过6亿元的锂电池模块和电池
